```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
msleep %>%
  group_by(vore) %>%
  summarize(`average body weight` = mean(bodywt))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
msleep %>%
  group_by(vore) %>%
  summarize(`average body weight` = mean(bodywt)) %>%
  knitr::kable()
```

```{r, fig.cap = "Wow captions too!"}
ggplot(msleep, aes(x = sleep_total, y = bodywt)) +
  geom_point() + scale_x_log10() + scale_y_log10()
```
